QuestData.Title: WANTED: Raging Earthguard
QuestData.Description:
Be careful when traveling toward Anglepoint!
An immense creature of the earth has spawned on one of the hills, threatening all who go near.
Any adventurers who take down this earthen guardian shall be rewarded greatly.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This earthly revenant has spawned, threatening all who approach.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Raging Earthguard west of Norwington Estate.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Lord Norwington at the Norwington Estate.
QuestData.RewardText: You defeated the revenant! Bully! Well done as always, my friend!
